name: [ lucidus impressionem ]
description:
~ lucid impression ~
.
.
"submit into the shadow, to whisper the omen,
the mirage of the pale moon brings the grotesque thirst.

watch me, even from afar
watch me fight all the giants
watch me bathed with glory
watch me find serenity within this unsung lullaby...

as I break the ordinary, and I dance with ice and fire,
and so the magic will come once two fates collide
still untouched, yet so lucid
still unreachable, yet so close..."
--210222
.
.
Graphite and colored pencils on paper.
2400 x 2400 pixel.
.
.
.
Note:
Ever had that kind of vision in your head which makes you wanna grab something to write/draw it down?
Sometimes it happens to me, but everytime I try to write it down, it won't come out,
like.... it was there in my mind, somehow you can't put it into words or into visual,
somehow you've been wrapped by unknown feelings or emotions, unable to move forward/backward.
You stuck between reality and your fantasy, and I always crave for that moments.
.
.
.
IG & Twitter: @nicofey
